text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
IRM 2.3.81 has been revised to include internal control information.
Large Business Small Business (LMSB), Small Business/Self-Employed (SB/SE), Tax Exempt/Government Wage & Investment (W&I).
Table of Contents
Purpose: This transmits revised IRM 2.3.81, IDRS Terminal Command Code (CC) ESTAB modiﬁer “A” (ESTABA).
“REQUEST COMPLETED” message on line 24 indicates all data ﬁelds contain valid data, and request has been accepted by the DOC database.
A one character alphabetic code inputted on line 1, column 7 of ESTABA. Used to identify the type of request being made. The request code is:

Request Purpose Code E Not available for user input. This request code will display as a result of a successfully completed Request Code “L.” L Used to obtain a list ESTAB requestor’s mailing addresses stored on the DOC RDMS database.
When an element of data is invalid a error message will be displayed on line 24. The element that is invalid will display an asterisk to the right of the invalid

element. ERROR MESSAGES Error 1 Invalid Command Code Modiﬁer, must be A, D, H, M, R, or S. Solution 1 Self Explanatory Error 2 Invalid, must perform Request-Code “L” prior to Request-Code “E” Solution 2 Must perform ESTABA Request Code “L” before per- forming Request Code “E” Error 3 Invalid State-Code, enter a valid two character State Code Solution 3 Example, the mailing State Code for OHIO is OH. Error 4 Invalid Request-Code, code must be “A,” “E,” or “L” Solution 4 Put a “L” in line 1 column 7 Error 5 Invalid Next Page value, this ﬁeld must be a “+,” “-,” or Empty Solution 5 Self Explanatory Error 6 Invalid, please put an “X” to the left of your address Solution 6 Self Explanatory Error 7 Invalid, remove “X” from address above, or remove + or - from Next-Page ﬁeld Solution 7 Only one option can contain information. Error 8 Invalid, select “X” in a address above, or put + or - in Next-Page ﬁeld Solution 8 One option must be chosen.
When an element of data is invalid a error message will be displayed on line
The element that is invalid will display an asterisk to the right of the invalid element.
When an element of data is invalid a error message will be displayed on line 24. The element that is invalid will display an asterisk to the right of the invalid

2.3.81 ERROR MESSAGES Error 1 Invalid Command Code Modiﬁer, must be A, D, H, M, R, or S. Solution 1 Self Explanatory Error 2 Invalid, the Select Desired Action ﬁeld must contain a “D”, “U”, or “N” Solution 2 Self Explanatory Error 3 Invalid State-Code, please enter a valid 2 character state abbreviation Solution 3 Self Explanatory Error 4 Invalid Street-Suffix, please enter a valid suffix abbre- viation Solution 4 Self Explanatory Error 5 Invalid Street-Suffix, enter a valid 2 to 4 character suffix abbreviation Solution 5 Self Explanatory Error 6 Invalid Street-Direction, must be empty or N, W, E, S, NW, NE, SW, SE Solution 6 Self Explanatory Error 7 Invalid State-Code, must be a valid 2 character state abbreviation Solution 7 Self Explanatory Error 8 Invalid Data, Zip Code required: 99999-9999 or 99999 Solution 8 Self Explanatory Error 9 Invalid Zip-Cd Ext., extension ﬁeld must contain 4 numbers, or 4 spaces Solution 9 Self Explanatory Error 10 Invalid Zip-Code, Zip Code ﬁeld must contain numbers Solution 10 Self Explanatory
This Page Intentionally Left Blank

through
must contain “ESTAB”. CC MODIFIER - Column
must be an “A”. REQUEST CODE - Column

and
, this ﬁeld must contain an two character State Code. Enter a two character State Code to see a list of all addresses from a given State. SELECT STREET ADDRESS - Column
, place an “X” in the Select-Street-Address ﬁeld, across from the Street Address you wish to select. NEXT PAGE NUMBER - Column
, to display next page of addresses enter a “+. ” To display previous page enter a “-.”
NEXT PAGE NUMBER - Column 33, to display next page of addresses enter a “+. ” To display previous page enter a “-.”
